mapper.insert: insert into blog(email, title, intro, url, createdate) values(#{email}, #{title}, #{intro}, #{url}, sysdate)
insert into blogcategory(email, category_name, create_date, BLOG_TITLE, cate_id) values(#{email}, '전체 보기', sysdate, #{title}, #{cate_id})
insert into blogcategory(email, category_name, create_date, BLOG_TITLE, cate_id) values(#{email}, #{addcate_name}, sysdate, #{title}, #{addcate_id})
mapper.select: select b.CATEGORY_NAME, b.CATE_ID from BLOGCATEGORY b where email=#{email}
mapper.update: update cateorder set cate_index = #{cate_index} where cate_id = #{cate_id}
mapper.select: select a.*, o.CATE_INDEX from (select * from BLOGCATEGORY where email=#{email}) a left join CATEORDER o on a.cate_id=o.cate_id order by o.CATE_INDEX asc
